column4: did you go through the System>administration>printing>printers menu setup?
I did that and mine just worked ok.
I picked Deskjet 3520 and the hpijs driver was inatalled.
yes that's how I did it.... I even disabled bidirectional mode via windows
might the printer support be better in Edgy? ir so, I'll upgrade.
pick local printer and pick use a dected printer?
that's the funny thing,,,, when I choose the "local" dot, all I get is LPT1 and so forth, no USB listed.
My setup doesn't even identify the device, it just calls it Deskjet-3520
it shows up under cups! but not local.
my device manager calls it /dev/usblp0 if that helps you?
I couldn't get cups printing working without going to some hair pulling out hairs on the cups.conf file
and my Samsung networked printer still never finishes a job (it actually does) and I have to cancel the print job so I am not done there yet.
